name: Nakitel
description:
Nakitel is an international company operating in the field of information technology. The company specializes in analytics, development, design and software support. The key activity of the company is development and implementation of software and hardware for information security. 
There are Nakitel representative offices in Ukraine, Russia and Germany.  Given 12 years of experience in the field of IT Nakitel is ready to implement projects of any complexity. Each division of the company is responsible for different specific area.
